titleInfo.title: A Relaxed Kaanov iteration for the p-poisson problem

mods.abstract: In this paper we introduce and analyze an iteratively re-weighted algorithm, that allows to approximate the weak solution of the p-Poisson problem for 1<p2 by iteratively solving a sequence of linear elliptic problems. The algorithm can be interpreted as a relaxed Kaanov iteration, as so-called in the specific literature of the numerical solution of quasi-linear equations. The main contribution of the paper is proving that the algorithm converges at least with an algebraic rate.

bibliographicCitation.dgps: Diening, L., Fornasier, M., Tomasi, R. & Wank, M. (2020). A Relaxed Kaanov iteration for the p-poisson problem. Numerische Mathematik, 145, 1-34. Springer Nature. doi:10.1007/s00211-020-01107-1.
